message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a special price of $12,000. I think it would be a valuable addition to what you're doing.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product's value to me is quite high. Could you consider $11,000? It's a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm unable to go beyond $9,500 for this product. Let me know if this is something we can agree upon.
